title: A Pilgrim Stranger
description: Alfredo Salgado, Catholic schoolboy and proud Spaniard, wages his own personal offensive against the dictates of modernity and the enemies of Orthodoxy and the Old Faith. Set in 1981 and 2015 against a backdrop of societal upheaval A PILGRIM STRANGER is an ebullient satire of contemporary values.
author: Mark Samuels
